title: Channel Rules
subtitle: Follow these guidelines to maximize your trading success

rules.title: Risk Management
rules.description: Never invest more than 2% of your capital in a single trade. Always use stop-loss.

rules.title: Entry/Exit Discipline
rules.description: Enter and exit trades exactly at the given levels. Don't chase trades after signals.

rules.title: Record Keeping
rules.description: Maintain a trading journal with all entries, exits, and reasons for trades.
